entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Merritt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Merritt 08:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: WSW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
